thread.section_title: Veterans United Home Loans Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Veterans United Home Loans | www.veteransunited.com
thread.title: Teri Garrison-Kinsman
thread.title_full: Veterans United Home Loans reviewed by Teri Garrison-Kinsman

author: Teri Garrison-Kinsman
title: Teri Garrison-Kinsman
text:
We were blessed to find Veterans United. As a person who served but did not retire in the Reserve Forces, I did not think we would be eligible for support or assistance in owning our own home. We found the Veterans United website late one evening, took a chance and inquired about eligibility. That's when Amber Brown came into our lives.
An articulate communicator, adept guide and caring soul, Amber took our dream and literally helped turned it place we now call home. We could not have done it without her and all of the other wonderful people at Veterans United.
